intro.title: You're Invited! 🎉
intro.body_1: I’m celebrating my 40th birthday, and I’d love for you to join the party! Expect good vibes, great company, varied music, costumes maybe.
intro.body_2: 🔥 We’ll fire up the grill, have some tasty snacks, and of course, drinks will be flowing!
details_body: Join us for an unforgettable celebration! 🎉
location_body: Location info and a map will go here. 📍
rsvp.body: Let us know who's coming and if you're staying overnight!
